Row.Text: 所有同盟類型均可形成共用視野。與盟友進行貿易可獲得3倍同盟點數。[NEWLINE]存在至少1級的[ICON_ALLIANCE]聯盟，從與您有 [ICON_TradeRoute] 貿易路線的文明+25% [ICON_Tourism] 旅遊業績。[NEWLINE]存在至少2級的[ICON_ALLIANCE]聯盟，從與您有 [ICON_TradeRoute] 貿易路線的文明再+50% [ICON_Tourism] 旅遊業績，並探明世界地圖。[NEWLINE]存在至少3級的[ICON_ALLIANCE]聯盟，從與您有 [ICON_TradeRoute] 貿易路線的文明再+75% [ICON_Tourism] 旅遊業績，每回合每獲得50點 [ICON_Tourism]旅遊業績，即可每回合獲得1點[ICON_RESIDENT_EMBASSY]外交支持。[NEWLINE]有特色輕騎兵單位遊擊小隊。
晴霜的祝念
米卡
除了給同伴添麻煩，已經沒什麼好怕的了。
在遠征隊中擔當前偵骨幹的年輕騎士，為人安靜低調，踏實地對待著每一份經手的工作，行軍餐的美味程度可圈可點。只不過在與陌生人打交道時，總難免顯露靦腆膽怯的一面。
平凡家庭出身的年輕騎士，在小隊中擔任「前進測繪員」一職。希望成為團隊的助力。
米卡能通過商路獲得高額的同盟點數，並且從聯盟中獲得視野，探明地圖，獲得旅遊業績的加成。
所屬西風騎士團遊擊小隊的米卡，盡職盡責地完成著各類從天而降的工作。搭建營帳、生火做飯、維護裝備…就連後勤隊長赫塔都要對米卡的出色效率予以肯定。
米卡所表現出的任勞任怨並非因為他性格軟弱，不善拒絕他人的要求，而是他發自內心地重視團隊合作，將自己定位為需要向強者不斷學習的後輩。「幫大家跑跑腿，力所能及，還能提升團隊的整體收益！」而米卡自己最喜歡的事，與他身為「前進測繪員」的本職是密不可分的。那便是：勘查陌生的區域，記錄地形資料的細節，繪製出精准有效的地圖。
「此處為一資源富集點，但周遭有魔物聚集，需謹慎。」夢想著成為繪製地圖專家的米卡，此刻，又為筆下的新版軍用地圖添加了一條注釋。
我會竭盡全力，為你探清前路，查明敵情！
要掃蕩罪惡的話，我必須獨自行走在長夜之中。
與你並肩作戰是我的榮幸，請隨意差遣我吧。
嗯，心情真舒暢！
唔…行吧。
我會肅清威脅！
對不起了！
讓你為我費心了。
唔…不管怎麼樣，還是謝了。
希望我能給你帶來更多有用的情報。
核對當前位置、向目標磁區測距…嗯，地理狀況記錄完畢。
這風，是出自風神的旨意。（譴責你）
西風騎士團遊擊小隊所屬，前進測繪員米卡，向你報到。
希望我能給你帶來更多有用的情報，真真切切地幫你分擔壓力！
實在感謝！這下，我就距離目標更近了——讓大家安安心心地前進，不必在崎嶇的地形受苦受累，也不用懼怕角落裡隱藏的危險！
請允許我…一直和你同行，一起丈量腳下的大地！
無論處在什麼環境裡，只要仔細探索，應該都可以找到通暢的道路。
要不然，我們也約定幾個暗語？畢竟我們會長期合作，這樣更方便。哦，你說了算，我都聽你的！
請你後退。
早知道…就迂回了…
是新的收穫！
有點麻煩
我只希望讓我的家人們平平安安地完成任務，輕鬆愉快地度過每一天。
這風，是出自風神的旨意。
我希望讓我的家人們平平安安地完成任務，輕鬆愉快地度過每一天。

所有同盟类型均可形成共享视野。与盟友进行贸易可获得3倍同盟点数。[NEWLINE]存在至少1级的[ICON_ALLIANCE]联盟，从与您有 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线的文明+25% [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE]存在至少2级的[ICON_ALLIANCE]联盟，从与您有 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线的文明再+50% [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩，并探明世界地图。[NEWLINE]存在至少3级的[ICON_ALLIANCE]联盟，从与您有 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线的文明再+75% [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩，每回合每获得50点 [ICON_Tourism]旅游业绩，即可每回合获得1点[ICON_RESIDENT_EMBASSY]外交支持。[NEWLINE]有特色轻骑兵单位游击小队。
晴霜的祝念
米卡
除了给同伴添麻烦，已经没什么好怕的了。
在远征队中担当前侦骨干的年轻骑士，为人安静低调，踏实地对待着每一份经手的工作，行军餐的美味程度可圈可点。只不过在与陌生人打交道时，总难免显露腼腆胆怯的一面。
平凡家庭出身的年轻骑士，在小队中担任「前进测绘员」一职。希望成为团队的助力。
米卡能通过商路获得高额的同盟点数，并且从联盟中获得视野，探明地图，获得旅游业绩的加成。
所属西风骑士团游击小队的米卡，尽职尽责地完成着各类从天而降的工作。搭建营帐、生火做饭、维护装备…就连后勤队长赫塔都要对米卡的出色效率予以肯定。
米卡所表现出的任劳任怨并非因为他性格软弱，不善拒绝他人的要求，而是他发自内心地重视团队合作，将自己定位为需要向强者不断学习的后辈。「帮大家跑跑腿，力所能及，还能提升团队的整体收益！」而米卡自己最喜欢的事，与他身为「前进测绘员」的本职是密不可分的。那便是：勘查陌生的区域，记录地形数据的细节，绘制出精准有效的地图。
「此处为一资源富集点，但周遭有魔物聚集，需谨慎。」梦想着成为绘制地图专家的米卡，此刻，又为笔下的新版军用地图添加了一条注释。
我会竭尽全力，为你探清前路，查明敌情！
要扫荡罪恶的话，我必须独自行走在长夜之中。
与你并肩作战是我的荣幸，请随意差遣我吧。
嗯，心情真舒畅！
唔…行吧。
我会肃清威胁！
对不起了！
让你为我费心了。
唔…不管怎么样，还是谢了。
希望我能给你带来更多有用的情报。
核对当前位置、向目标扇区测距…嗯，地理状况记录完毕。
这风，是出自风神的旨意。（谴责你）
西风骑士团游击小队所属，前进测绘员米卡，向你报到。
希望我能给你带来更多有用的情报，真真切切地帮你分担压力！
实在感谢！这下，我就距离目标更近了——让大家安安心心地前进，不必在崎岖的地形受苦受累，也不用惧怕角落里隐藏的危险！
请允许我…一直和你同行，一起丈量脚下的大地！
无论处在什么环境里，只要仔细探索，应该都可以找到通畅的道路。
要不然，我们也约定几个暗语？毕竟我们会长期合作，这样更方便。哦，你说了算，我都听你的！
请你后退。
早知道…就迂回了…
是新的收获！
有点麻烦
我只希望让我的家人们平平安安地完成任务，轻松愉快地度过每一天。
这风，是出自风神的旨意。
我希望让我的家人们平平安安地完成任务，轻松愉快地度过每一天。

All Alliance types provide Shared Visibility.Trading with Allies earns triple as many bonus Alliance Points.[NEWLINE]At least 1 level of [ICON_ALLIANCE]Alliance exists，+25% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism rate towards other civilizations you have a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to.[NEWLINE]At least 1 level of [ICON_ALLIANCE]Alliance exists，+50% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism rate towards other civilizations you have a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to,and explore the World map。[NEWLINE]At least 3 level of [ICON_ALLIANCE]Alliance exists，+75% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism rate towards other civilizations you have a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to，For every 50 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism per turn earn 1 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn. [NEWLINE]Unique Light cavalry unit Recon Company.
SunFrost
Mika
There is nothing to be afraid of except for causing trouble to my companions.

The young knight, who served as a former detective backbone in the expedition team, was quiet and low-key, steadfastly handling every task he handled, and the deliciousness of the marching meal was commendable. However, when dealing with strangers, it is inevitable to show a shy and timid side.
A young knight from an ordinary family background holds the position of "Forward Surveyor" in the squad. I hope to be the assistance of the team.
Mika can earn high alliance points through trade routes, and gain visibility from the alliance, explore maps, and earn a bonus on tourism performance.

Mika of the guerrilla team of the Westwind Order of chivalry is dutifully completing all kinds of work falling from the sky. Building a camp, cooking a fire, maintaining equipment... even logistics captain Hertha needs to praise Mika's excellent efficiency.

The hardworking and blameless performance of Mika is not due to his weak personality and inability to refuse others' demands, but because he values teamwork from the bottom of his heart and positions himself as a younger generation who needs to constantly learn from the strong. Helping everyone run errands, within his ability, can also improve the overall profitability of the team! "And Mika's favorite thing is closely related to his position as a" forward surveyor ". That is to explore unfamiliar areas, record the details of terrain data, and draw accurate and effective maps.
This is a resource rich point, but there are monsters gathering around it, so be careful. "Mika, who dreams of becoming a map expert, added a note to his new military map at this moment.
I will do my best to explore the way forward and identify the enemy situation for you!
To sweep away evil, I must walk alone in the long night.
It's my honor to fight alongside you, please send me as you please.
Well, I feel so happy!
Um... OK.
I will clear the threat!
Sorry!
Let you worry about me.
Well... Thank you anyway.
I hope I can bring you more useful information.
Check the current position and measure the distance to the target sector... Well, the geographical conditions are recorded.
This wind is the will of the wind god. (Denouce you)
Mika, a forward surveyor belonging to the guerrilla squad of the westerly knights, reports to you.
I hope I can bring you more useful information and really help you share the pressure!
Thank you so much! Now, I am closer to the goal - let us move forward with peace of mind, without suffering in the rugged terrain, and without fear of the hidden danger in the corner!
Please allow me... To walk with you all the time and measure the earth under my feet!
No matter what environment you are in, you can find a smooth way as long as you explore carefully.
Otherwise, how many code words should we agree on? After all, we will cooperate for a long time, which is more convenient. Oh, it's up to you. I'll listen to you!
Please step back.
If I had known... I would have made a detour
Is a new harvest!
A little trouble
I just want my family to finish the task safely and spend every day happily.
This wind is the will of the wind god.
I hope my family can finish the task safely and spend every day happily.
